title: Enchanting Emerald Vaalai Poo Haaram with Diamond Floral Motifs
materials: Medium Green Hue). Features Hyderabadi Polish for lasting sheen.
features: Intricate floral designs studded with brilliant-cut diamonds and vibrant emerald accents. The Vaalai Poo (banana flower) Haaram design is modernized with delicate diamond lacework. Features pear-shaped emerald drops for graceful movement and a touch of traditional charm. The emeralds are bezel set for security and to enhance their natural luster.
colors: complemented by rich green emeralds. A harmonious blend of traditional South Indian color palettes.
occasions: and grand festive occasions like Ugadi and Sankranthi. Also suitable for upscale parties and modern celebrations where a touch of South Indian elegance is desired.
description: This exquisite Haaram beautifully marries traditional South Indian design with contemporary aesthetics. The combination of sparkling diamonds and vibrant emeralds creates a captivating effect. The fine craftsmanship and high-quality materials ensure that this piece will be treasured for generations. The Vaalai Poo design symbolizes prosperity and good fortune, making it a meaningful and cherished heirloom.
